check.name: FileLength
check.description:
Checks for long source files.

Rationale: If a source file becomes very long it is hard to understand. Therefore, long classes should usually be refactored into several individual classes that focus on a specific task.

property.name: fileExtensions
property.description: Specify the file extensions of the files to process.

property.name: max
property.description: Specify the maximum number of lines allowed.
